raw akas.title: Niko and the Sword of Light

akas: Niko and the Sword of Light (original title)
Niko y la espada iluminada Spain
akas from release info: Niko and the Sword of Light (original title)
Niko y la espada iluminada Spain

1.title: A Day in Carondolet

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: As Queen Lyra's birthday celebration begins, Niko suspects that a strange bug might be an agent of darkness.

2.title: A Night in Carondolet

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: A message from The Darkness prompts Niko and his friends on a new journey to find an ancient relic.

3.title: The Forest of Fangs

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Niko and his friends search for an ancient lorekeeper to learn more about the Amulet of Power.

4.title: Sky Whale City

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Our heroes search for an ancient map piece in a wondrous city perched atop a flying whale.

5.title: The Thorn of Contention

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Following a rough storm, our heroes find themselves between two races locked in a fight for a mysterious tower.

0.title: From the Desert of Despair Into the Swamp of Sorrow!

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: From the Temple of Champions to the Bridge of Doom

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Mandok accidentally releases Niko from a magical chrysalis. Instead of a fully-grown Champion of Carondolet, ghostly princess Lyra finds a ten year old boy. Lyra must lead NIko across the Bridge of Doom, but when the horrible Xerxes returns and attacks, Lyra has no choice but to put her faith in untested Niko.

2.title: From the Sky Maze of Anguish to the Swamp of Sorrow

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Lyra must guide Niko, Mandok and Flicker through a deadly sky maze, past the fearsome Arachtaur, as a vicious three-headed monster stalks the team. When the quest almost fails, Lyra makes a tremendous sacrifice.

3.title: From the Swamp to Sorrow to the Hills of Humiliation

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Niko's team reaches Carapace, the perfect hiding spot, only to discover the voracious Mugwhump In its place. Chompsky, Carapace's last citizen, helps Niko and Lyra face this bloated menace, and discover a better goal than hiding.

4.title: From the Phantom Woods to the Mountains of Misery

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The Hill Giants send Niko and Lyra into the Shoodakooda Wood, where their greatest regrets become real. With the help of Niko and his Sword, Lyra puts her past behind her. Meanwhile, Mandok is captured by an enemy.

5.title: From the Sea of Suffering to the Faraway Shore

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Niko and Lyra are received by the Shrimp King, only to learn the Shrimpfolk are about to engage in a futile battle with the ferocious Mantigore to finally free the captured Dolphin Queen. Mandok forms an uneasy alliance.

6.title: From the Tumbledowns to the Gap of Gloom

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Niko, Lyra and Mandok help the Tumblebees fend off the terrible Prickletwister that has been terrorizing the town, and join forces with a mysterious traveler.

7.title: From the Endless Expanse to the Thorns of Tribulation

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Niko's new sidekick leads the team through the Endless Expanse, as Nar Est's agent tries to stop them at every turn. When the enemy reveals himself, Niko must defeat a threat from within, without his Sword.

8.title: From the Cliffs of Catastrophe to the Pools of Destiny

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Coming close to the Pools of Destiny, Niko and Lyra find another human - Aura, a champion who was left behind. But it's Niko who's left behind when Lyra and Aura set off to finish the quest without him.

9.title: From the Shattering Springs to the Clouds of Chaos

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Niko, Lyra and Mandok land on a Cloud Clipper belonging to the notorious Captain Nimbeard of the Sky Pirates. They're about to be thrown overboard, but when Nar Est sends a deadly sky monster after them, it's all hands on deck.

10.title: From the Peaks of Peril to the Mounds of Mania

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: While descending the Peaks of Peril, a protocol gaffe turns the normally proper Umlauti against our heroes. To earn his freedom, Niko must compete against Jackal in a challenging, gladiatorial-style race.

11.title: From the Tunnels of Terror to the Den of Doom

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: When a swarm of Exuber-Ants chase the team and Lyra is bitten. Niko and Mandok must retrieve a powerful suit of armor hidden deep underground from the ferocious Diggantus.

12.title: From the Cursed Volcano to the End of Hope

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Niko and Lyra face Nar Est on his home turf, but Niko's final showdown doesn't go as smoothly as planned.

13.title: From the Depths of Despair...

episode of.title: Niko and the Sword of Light (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Niko leads the Army of the Light in a freewheeling final battle and discovers the true power behind Nar Est.

imdb.plot outline: Ten-year-old Niko, the last of his kind in a strange world, embarks on an epic quest to bring light back to his land. Armed with his magic sword, Niko journeys to the Cursed Volcano, making new friends and powerful foes while uncovering secrets about his mysterious past.
imdb.title: Niko and the Sword of Light
plot: Ten-year-old Niko, the last of his kind in a strange world, embarks on an epic quest to bring light back to his land. Armed with his magic sword, Niko journeys to the Cursed Volcano, making new friends and powerful foes while uncovering secrets about his mysterious past.::Jwelch5742
